Room.Name: The Swift Hand Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small room somewhere inside the Swift Hand Thieves' Guild.
Room.LongDescription: This secret initiation and training location allows young thieves to advance their way up the thieving ladder. Thieves may train up to the level of Rogue, First Class, after which they must seek out a more suitable guild in perhaps a richer neighborhood in order to advance to the status of a Footpad.
